text: "Epic" is a 1990 song by Faith No More. It is the second single from their third studio album The Real Thing. It went to number 9 in the United States, number 25 in the United Kingdom, number 2 in New Zealand, number 1 in Australia, number 19 in Canada and number 27 in Ireland. ==Track listings== American release This version was released in the US as a "Slash sticker" labelled 7-inch and as a cassette with a "Burning Splash" sleeve. Australian release The 7-inch and cassette versions of this release only had tracks 1 and 2, unlike the 12-inch which featured all 3. UK and international release The initial release of "Epic", released in the UK, Germany, Japan and internationally. The 7-inch editions only had tracks one, two, and occasionally three. Track five was exclusive to Japanese issues.The Faith No More Discography UK and international reissue Reissue version of the single "Epic". The 7-inch vinyl and cassette versions only had the first two tracks. ==References== Category:1990 songs Category:Faith No More songs
title: Epic (Faith No More song)
